title: Failed to reconnect
body:
Hi, i got a problem, when i connect to league of legend Lobby, it disconnect and i can see the message, we are attempting to reconnect you to the server. After it say failed to reconnect, and i must close the game . It's since the new update. I'm on a Mac computer and i don't have internet issues so i don't understand. 

Thank you for your time

Gl HF every one

replies.body: This message can occur when your network loses connection to our game servers completely, but is making an effort to get you back in.   Regardless of your operating system or how amazing your internet is,  you can still have issues to a specific server.  Run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Tx for your time, so i followed every steps and it doesn't work, i even shut down my fire wall. I don't understand until last patch, i got no problem with it.

Thanks for trying!  Don't worry, we'll keep working with you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will assist individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs to attach to your ticket.  We'll get back to you!
